Package ojvm.operations

Interface Summary
InstructionVisitor One method for each instruction.
 

Class Summary
BytecodeInterpreter One method for each instruction.
BytecodeVerifier One method for each instruction.
ClassInitializing Initializes classes ignoring recursion; locks; threads; etc for now File created June 20, 2000
ClassLinking Takes an AbsynClass and builds an InternalClass.
ClassLoading Maintains a hashtable of loaded classes.
Exceptions Building Java exceptions out of internal exceptions File created June 23, 2000
NativeMethods Native methods encountered while testing simple programs that use Sun's libraries File created June 22, 2000
PrimitiveOperations Dictionary of the operations on primitive JavaValues.
Strings Representations of Java strings File created June 23, 2000
 

Exception Summary
DivisionE Exception thrown by primitive operations idiv, and irem
InitializeE Exceptions related to class initialization
LinkE Exceptions related to loading, linking, and initializing classes
NativeE Native method not found
VerifyE Exceptions related to class verification
